options.optionText: You realize the whole vault is fucking right now, right?

options.optionText: Thinking of turning the vault into a porn studio. Want to be our head scriptwriter?

auto_lines: Welcome to the chamber of shame! Population: me... and my right hand. Did you bring lube? No? Eh, rookie mistake.
